alert.note: Alert for Stokes; Surry; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central North Carolina and northwest North Carolina, including the following counties, in north central North Carolina, Stokes and Surry. In northwest North Carolina, Yadkin. * WHEN...Until 630 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 331 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Ararat River, Arnold Branch, Baker Branch, Brushy Fork Creek, Belews Creek, Big Beaver Island Creek, Beaverdam Creek and Beaver Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mount Airy... Elkin... Fairview... Yadkinville... Jonesville... Dobson... Pilot Mountain... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of flooding, including mudslides or flooded roads, to the National Weather Service by calling toll free at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and pictures can also be shared on the National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter.
